contentrichtext.text: '''Dave Stewart''' may refer to: * [[Dave Stewart (baseball)]] (born 1957), former pitcher in Major League Baseball and 1989 World Series MVP * [[David A. Stewart]] (born 1952), English musician and record producer best known for his work with Eurythmics * [[Dave Stewart (footballer)]] (born 1958), Northern Irish footballer (Hull City, Scunthorpe United, Northern Ireland) * [[Dave Stewart (keyboardist)]] (born 1950), former member of Egg, Hatfield & The North, National Health and Bruford, now works with vocalist Barbara Gaskin * Dave Stewart, drummer with the group [[Camel (band)|Camel]] * Dave Stewart, guitar and vocals with [[Steve Hillage]]'s band * [[Dave Stewart (artist)]], colorist in the comics industry * [[Dave Stewart (EastEnders)|Dave Stewart (''EastEnders'')]], fictional character in ''EastEnders'' * [[Dave Stewart (soccer)]], retired American soccer forward * [[Dave Stewart (trombonist)]], bass trombonist and music teacher based in London ==See also== * [[David Stewart (disambiguation)]] * [[David Stuart (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Stewart, Dave}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Stewart, Dave}}
